All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Implements the astraction of the checkerboard
    BoardParser
    BoardParser handles the conversion of the board's configuration to and from a JSON file format.
    Game
    Manages the gameplay
    Main  
    Move
    A class that implements the abstraction of the movement of a piece
    MovesLog
    Stores the Moves that are performed during gameplay
    Piece
    Implements the abstraction of a piece on the Board
    Position
    Implements the abstraction of each square on the checkerboard or pixels on the board view
    Solver
    Sends the board's configuration to an external server and receives from it the moves needed in order to win the game
    Window
